English.STR_TXT_PLACEHOLDER_LEGALNAME: Support _, letters, numbers (can't start with num)
English.STR_LBL_CARDFRONT_FRONTEND_TEXT: Front side - Frontend template webpage (.htm/.html)(Link supported)
English.STR_LBL_CARDFRONT_BACKEND_TEXT: Front side - Backend Python script (.py)(Link supported)
English.STR_LBL_CARDBACK_FRONTEND_TEXT: Back side - Frontend template webpage (.htm/.html)(Link supported)
English.STR_LBL_CARDBACK_BACKEND_TEXT: Back side - Backend Python script (.py)(Link supported)
English.STR_LBL_WORDLISTNAME_TEXT: Word list name (Up to 10 characters long)
English.STR_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_DELETE: Are you sure to delete? This operation will take effect after saving.
English.STR_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_INVALIDFILE: There are invalid files or the path cannot be found.
English.STR_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CARD1ISNULL: At least one word list does not specify Card type 1.
English.STR_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_NOTFOUNDWORDLIST: Word list [%s] in the database is not in Library. Drop it?
English.STR_INFODIALOG_MSG_COMPLETE: Complete! You can switch to INDEX to start learning.
English.STR_INFODIALOG_MSG_MISSIONCOMPLETE: Congratulation, there are no more tasks today! Come and see again tomorrow.
English.STR_INFODIALOG_MSG_CONTINUETOSTUDYINGNEW: All due words has been reviewed. You can try to turn off [Review only] to study new words.
English.STR_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_NOFURTHERREVIEW: Are you sure that this vocabulary card no longer requires review?

简体中文.STR_LBL_CARDNAME_TEXT: 卡片名称（不超过10个字符）
简体中文.STR_TXT_PLACEHOLDER_LEGALNAME: 支持下划线、英文字母和数字（数字不可作为开头）
简体中文.STR_LBL_CARDFRONT_FRONTEND_TEXT: 正面-前端模板网页（.htm/.html）（支持链接）
简体中文.STR_LBL_CARDFRONT_BACKEND_TEXT: 正面-后端Python脚本（.py）（支持链接）
简体中文.STR_LBL_CARDBACK_FRONTEND_TEXT: 背面-前端模板网页（.htm/.html）（支持链接）
简体中文.STR_LBL_CARDBACK_BACKEND_TEXT: 背面-后端Python脚本（.py）（支持链接）
简体中文.STR_LBL_WORDLISTNAME_TEXT: 单词表名称（不超过10个字符）
简体中文.STR_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_DELETE: 确定删除？该操作将在保存后生效。
简体中文.STR_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_INVALIDFILE: 找不到文件路径或存在无效的文件。
简体中文.STR_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CARD1ISNULL: 至少有一个单词表没有指定卡片1。
简体中文.STR_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_NOTFOUNDWORDLIST: 数据库中的单词表[%s]不在库中。是否删除？
简体中文.STR_INFODIALOG_MSG_COMPLETE: 完成！您现在可以切换至首页开始学习了。
简体中文.STR_LBL_LEARNINGPROGRESSITEM_TEXT: 已学习（今日新，旧）/未学习/到期：
简体中文.STR_INFODIALOG_MSG_MISSIONCOMPLETE: 祝贺您，今天没有任务啦！明天再来看看吧。
简体中文.STR_INFODIALOG_MSG_CONTINUETOSTUDYINGNEW: 到期的单词都复习完了。你可以尝试关闭[只复习]继续学习新词汇。
简体中文.STR_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_NOFURTHERREVIEW: 您确定这张卡片无需再复习吗？
